marketing.name: Marketing
quickWins: Job Search Tracker Template - Notion/Sheets lead magnet (1 week, $0-100)
10 SEO Blog Posts - Target high-intent keywords (2-4 weeks)
LinkedIn Organic Content - 3-5 posts/week from founder (Start now)

finance.name: Finance
quickWins: Set up financial tracking - Stripe dashboard + spreadsheet + Mercury bank
Add annual plan - $119/year (20% off) improves cash flow & reduces churn
Enable dunning - Recover 30-50% of failed payments automatically

quickWins: Weekly Operating Rhythm - 30 min setup, immediate structure
One-Pager Template - Force clarity before building
Error & Feedback Pipeline - Sentry + simple feedback tracking

quickWins: Competitive Pricing Page - Show $25/month savings vs Huntr prominently
60 Second First Job Challenge - Engineer fastest onboarding in category
Target 'Huntr Alternative' Keywords - High-intent SEO content

product.name: Product

Follow-Up Reminder System - Nudge users to follow up on applications (1-2 weeks)
Progress Dashboard with Motivation - Celebrate wins, show progress (1 week)
